text.author: Santa Barbara Corpus of Spoken American English (ed. John W. Du Bois)
text.title: This Retirement Bit
text.summary: Friends discuss Sam's interest in retirement, whether or not some people they know who are involved in politics are political appointees, and growing basil.
text.summary2: On a smoke break, two colleagues discuss their surprise that another colleague Sam is interested in retirement, as well as people they need to call, including a Doctor Duvall, who lied about not being a political appointee, and then Sam joins the conversation and the three of them discuss growing herbs, particularly basil.
